knimeNode.name: RaUnion
knimeNode.shortDescription: Relational Algebra Union and Set Operations.

fullDescription.intro:
Combines two relations (tables) by performing a Union or other set operation on their tuples (rows). There is no separate Not operation, but here Union is combined with Not to create these common set operations.
Duplicates if any are removed from the output.
fullDescription.option: Keeps rows in the first table that do not occur in the second.
Keeps only rows that occur in both tables.
Keeps only rows that occur in one table or the other but not both.
